alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clewiston to near Okeelanta to 8 miles southeast of Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Belle Glade Camp and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southern and southeastern Florida.
